post_title: FS - T206 PSA Sov: Bender (sold), Magee (sold) + others.
post_content:
For Sale (Prices reduced) - Harder to find PSA Sovereigns plus four other great looking PSA's.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents add 6.5% to agreed upon price to cover ST.

T206 Bender Portrait Sovereign 350 - PSA 2  $old

T206 Magee Portrait Sovereign 150 - PSA 2  $old

T206 Red Chance Portrait P150 (super sharp looking card) - PSA 2.5  $old.

T206 Clark Griffith w/Bat SC 350/30 - PSA 2.5  $260 venmo no fee or $270 pp gs

T206 Hart (Southern League) Old Mill - PSA 3  $260 venmo no fee or $270 pp gs.

T206 Herzog (NY) P150 PSA 4 - $175 venmo no fee or $181 pp gs
Second price reduction plus others added including Red Chance and Griffith.
